nodes.text: Cloud diaries were journaling devices used by Chiss as both diaries and artistic canvases, depicting drawn trees and clouds with the details of the drawing constituting small squiggles that were writing.

The Chiss mid-ager Yomie kept a cloud diary when traveling with her betrothed Yoponek and the Agbui Haplif. Haplif hoped to read Yomie's cloud diary to learn her desires and motivations to better manipulate her, but she did not let him. After Shimkif sabotaged the Great Migration and the group left the planet, Yomie correctly deduced that the Agbui possessed telepathy and had been manipulating the Chiss. In response, Haplif murdered Yomie and dumped the young woman along with her cloud diary into the vacuum of space.
